title: Dia IV ADC LF (serious)  5on5 Team

embed.title: Tjark1 - Summoner Stats - League of Legends
embed.description: Tjark1 / Diamond 4 16LP / 152W 123L Win Ratio 55% / Kalista - 37W 16L Win Ratio 70%, Tristana - 24W 19L Win Ratio 56%, Lucian - 19W 16L Win Ratio 54%, Kog'Maw - 17W 8L Win Ratio 68%, Vayne - 12W 11L Win Ratio 52%

body:
Hi, 
I'm Albert from Berlin- 19 years old and going to university atm.
I'm an **ADC **main since 4 seasons and im currently rated on **Dia IV** on my 2nd Acc (tjark1). 

I am looking for a **serious 5 on 5 team** that is fun to play with at the same time. I would love to play tournaments etc at some point.
I expect you guys to be **reliable**. **German **and **english **teams are both fine.

 I do fullfil the standard requirements such as: 
 
1. TS + micro etc.
2. Reliable, on time etc.
3. communicative
4.  over 1,5 years Teamranked experience

Add me in game on my main account "Knooti"

Greetings Albert
